name: Jose Antonio Olivera Ortega
bio: Based in Madrid, Spain, Jose Antonio is a Sr. Software Engineer at Nexmo, contributing to the OpenTok Client SDKs and native codebase. He loves cross-platform and test-driven development, but hates pair programming. As an avid learner and programmer, Jose Antonio enjoys discovering more ways to create and innovate with technology, including mobile operating systems, WebRTC apps, Web APIs, IoT, and more.
